description: This file defines external function declarations related to obtaining configuration parameters, interface addresses, and registry information, likely for use in other C source files within the project. It serves as an interface header for bus utility functions in a Cisco/DSL Home Model environment.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueUlong
methods.description: Retrieves a parameter value as an unsigned long given the parameter name.

methods.name: CosaGetParamValueString
methods.description: Retrieves a parameter value as a string, given the parameter name, target buffer, and size.

methods.name: CosaGetInstanceNumberByIndex
methods.description: Gets the instance number associated with a specified object name and index.

methods.name: CosaGetInterfaceAddrByName
methods.description: Returns the interface address associated with a given interface name.

methods.name: CosaGetRegistryRootFolder
methods.description: Returns a pointer to the registry root folder.
